title: Star Wars Spoiler Generator
alt: The heroes seem to be gaining the upper hand until Darth Juul manages to flip the switch on the car wash control panel from 'REGULAR' to 'PREMIUM.'
transcript:
Star Wars Spoiler Generator[Shown below is a branching flowchart of sorts that begins at the phrase "In this Star Wars movie, our heroes return to take on the First Order and new villain...", then flows through various paths to build up a story.]In this Star Wars movie, our heroes return to take on the First Order and new villain...
Kyle Ren
